s: So I was little reluctant to buy kit on Amazon as I am used to more professional grade tools. Boy, did this kit blew my expectation! First of all, it has all the tools you will require for pedicure. Secondly, they are very good quality (as good as some professional tools).

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: You can use the Report abuse tool to report inaccurate listing information, violations of Amazon policy, and other issues. To access the tool, log in to Seller Central and use the main menu to select Performance, then Account Health. On the Account Health page, select Report abuse.

t: Amazon's New Brand Store Quality Rating: What It Means for You
s: Amazon has introduced a new feature called the Brand Store quality rating. This tool provides valuable insights into how your Brand Store performs compared to others, along with personalized tips on how to make it even better. You can find these insights in your Brand's Store insights dashboard.
